taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [Greek, a-, not or without, and schisma, split, alluding to indehiscent capsule]

bio:treatment.discussion: Aschisma is widely distributed in the Mediterranean area, and is disjunctive to central North America. It is found in dry climates on soil.

references.reference: Andrews, A. L. 1915. Aschisma kansanum, a new species, with remarks upon the genus. Torreya 15: 63–67.
